comments.body: You have to lay off people son as many services are not profitable at allSmart Contract Development  = in the unlucky but likey event of becoming centralised rather than staying decentralizedToken Development = with enough funding maybeNFT Marketplace Development = there you need a real good marketing with deep pockets.
